publisher.publisher-name: Association of Teachers of Advanced Composition

title-group.article-title: A Contributing Listener and Other Composition Wives: Reading and Writing the Feminine Metaphors in Composition Studies

permissions.copyright-statement: © 1996 Association of Teachers of Advanced Composition
